cookies.title: Cookies settings
cookies.description: Cookies are tiny files consisting from text strings and key-value pairs stored inside your browser cache
cookies.settingsBaseDescription: Stores basic values and settings that are necessary for application to run, for example even this settings
cookies.settingsMarketingDescription: Cookies that store data required by algorithms that can provide more relevant advertisements

banner1.slogan2: is shared cloud-based clipboard which allows You to copy and paste content between Your devices as easy as between applications on each device.
banner1.slogan3: Not even one extra unnecessary click, we promise!
banner1.slogan4: For example, choose content on Your computer by using CTRL + C and use CTRL + C or "Paste" option on Your another device(s).
banner1.slogan5: When there is no possibility to install application(s), interface of this web page can be used to synchronize with other devices.

banner2.slogan2: Even in case when your devices decided to do to 'silicon heaven'.
banner2.slogan3: All data are accessible through this webpage.

banner3.slogan1: Operation and maintenance are paid just from ads income.
banner3.slogan2: No spies. Application is developed ad open source software with source codes and API available for public.
banner3.slogan3: Free version is not just purposely made half-working crap with more limitations than functionality.
banner3.slogan3-2: Paid version only extends amounts of services like memory, storage time limit, etc...

banner4.heading1: Set up and ready to go within 5 minutes
banner4.slogan1: Just register on this webpage, download and install given apps for your devices and You are able to instantly use this service.
banner4.slogan2: No for long-lasting multistep and complicated sign-up process with multiple of unnecessary questions and marketing spam and complicated configuration.

win.description: Installable executable file for Microsoft Windows systems version 7 and up

linux.description: Installable .deb archive for Debian based Linux distributions like Debian, Ubuntu, Mint and it's derivatives

mac.description: .dmg package for Apple computers with MacOS version Leopard and higher

android.description: Application for smart phones and devices with Android system

ios.description: Application for Apple iPhone/iPad/iPod devices with iOS version 8 and higher

user.forbiddenCharacters: Not allowed characters. Only letters, numbers and ". - _" are allowed

register.welcomeNotification: Welcome! Now You are ready to go! If You have installed application on your devices already, You are able to log in now.
